column1:
3.3.7.4	
Summary of evidence and recommendations for urodynamics and uro-neurophysiological tests
Urodynamic investigation is the only method that can objectively assess the (dys-)function of the LUT.

Video-urodynamics is the optimum procedure for urodynamic investigation in neuro-urological 
disorders.

Specific uro-neurophysiological tests are elective procedures and should only be carried out in 
specialised settings.
